availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert L. Douthat (Simpson County, Kentucky, wagon maker.)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, wagon maker and carriage maker. Virginia native. Married to Frances S. Adams Douthat. Father of Sinia M. Douthat, Martha W. Douthat, and John R. Douthat. Wagon maker in Simpson County in 1850. Employed Wesley Farris as an apprentice in Simpson County in 1850. Carriage maker in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 69A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, p. 401.
